tool.name: Beacon2 Import
tool.description: Import JSON formatted datasets to beacon database
tool.command: ln -s '$input_json_file' ./input.json && #set $db_auth_source = $__user__.extra_preferences.get('beacon2_account|db_auth_source', "") #if $db_auth_source == "": #set $db_auth_source = "admin" #end if echo "Running as user: $db_auth_source. Set your credentials via: User -> Preferences -> Manage Information" && #set $db_user = $__user__.extra_preferences.get('beacon2_account|db_user', "") #if $db_user == "": #set $db_user = "root" #end if echo "Running as user: $db_user. Set your credentials via: User -> Preferences -> Manage Information" && #set $db_password = $__user__.extra_preferences.get('beacon2_account|db_password', "") #if $db_password == "": #set $db_password = "example" #end if echo "Running as user: $db_password. Set your credentials via: User -> Preferences -> Manage Information" && beacon2-import --input_json_file ./input.json --db-host $db_host --db-port $db_port --database '$database' --collection '$collection' --advance-connection --db-auth-source '$db_auth_source' --db-user '$db_user' --db-password '$db_password' $advanced_settings.clearAll #if $advanced_settings.clearColl: $advanced_settings.clearColl --removeCollection $advanced_settings.removeCollection #end if > logs.txt

param.label: INPUT JSON FILE
param.help: Input the local path to the JSON file or its name on your Galaxy History to import to beacon

param.label: CLEAR ALL COLLECTIONS
param.help: Delete all data before the new import

param.label: CLEAR SPECIFIC COLLECTION
param.help: Delete specific collection before the new import

param.label: REMOVED COLLECTION NAME
param.help: Define the collection name for deletion

tool.help: Import JSON formatted datasets to Beacon MongoDB
